00034 
00035 #define CF(format,target,v,maxlen)                              \
00036 {                                                               \
00037         if (format != target) {                                 \
00038                 snprintf (v, maxlen,                            \
00039                         _("Invalid format '%s', "               \
00040                         "expected '%s'."),                      \
00041                         exif_format_get_name (format),          \
00042                         exif_format_get_name (target));         \
00043                 break;                                          \
00044         }                                                       \
00045 }
00046 
00047 #define CC(number,target,v,maxlen)                                      \
00048 {                                                                       \
00049         if (number != target) {                                         \
00050                 snprintf (v, maxlen,                                    \
00051                         _("Invalid number of components (%i, "          \
00052                         "expected %i)."), (int) number, (int) target);  \
00053                 break;                                                  \
00054         }                                                               \
00055 }
00056 
00057 #define CC2(number,t1,t2,v,maxlen)                                      \
00058 {                                                                       \
00059         if ((number != t1) && (number != t2)) {                         \
00060                 snprintf (v, maxlen,                                    \
00061                         _("Invalid number of components (%i, "          \
00062                         "expected %i or %i)."), (int) number,           \
00063                         (int) t1, (int) t2);                            \
00064                 break;                                                  \
00065         }                                                               \
00066 }
00067

00267 /* Two-component values */
00268 static const struct {
00269         ExifTag tag;
00270         struct {
00271                 int index1, index2;
00272                 const char *string;
00273         } elem[39];
00274 } items2[] = {
00275 #ifndef NO_VERBOSE_TAG_DATA
00276   { MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_IMAGE_SIZE,
00277     { {0, 0, "2304x1728"},
00278       {4, 0, "1600x1200"},
00279       {5, 0, "2048x1536"},
00280       {8, 0, "2560x1920"},
00281       {34, 0, "1536x1024"},
00282       {36, 0, N_("3008x2008 or 3040x2024")},
00283       {37, 0, "3008x2000"},
00284       {35, 1, "2400x1600"},
00285       {32, 2, "960x480"},
00286       {33, 2, "1152x768"},
00287       {34, 2, "1536x1024"},
00288       {0,  0, NULL}}},
00289   { MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_PICTURE_MODE,
00290     { {0,   0, N_("Auto")},
00291       {5,   0, N_("Portrait")},
00292       {53,  0, N_("Underwater")},
00293       {255, 0, N_("Digital filter?")},
00294       {5,   1, N_("Portrait")},

00296       {13,  1, N_("Candlelight")},

00306 
00307 char *
00308 mnote_pentax_entry_get_value (MnotePentaxEntry *entry,
00309                               char *val, unsigned int maxlen)
00310 {
00311         ExifLong vl;
00312         ExifShort vs, vs2;
00313         int i = 0, j = 0;
00314 
00315         if (!entry) return (NULL);
00316 
00317         memset (val, 0, maxlen);
00318         maxlen--;
00319 
00320         switch (entry->tag) {
00321           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_MODE:
00322           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_QUALITY:
00323           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_FOCUS:
00324           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_FLASH:
00325           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_WHITE_BALANCE:
00326           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_SHARPNESS:
00327           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_CONTRAST:
00328           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_SATURATION:
00329           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_ISO_SPEED:
00330           case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_COLOR:
00331           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_MODE:
00332           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_QUALITY:
00333           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_FLASH_MODE:
00334           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_FOCUS_MODE:
00335           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_AFPOINT_SELECTED:
00336           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_AUTO_AFPOINT:
00337           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_WHITE_BALANCE:
00338           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_PICTURE_MODE:
00339           case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_IMAGE_SIZE:
00340           case MNOTE_CASIO2_TAG_BESTSHOT_MODE:
00341                 CF (entry->format, EXIF_FORMAT_SHORT, val, maxlen);
00342                 CC2 (entry->components, 1, 2, val, maxlen);
00343                 if (entry->components == 1) {
00344                         vs = exif_get_short (entry->data, entry->order);
00345 
00346                         /* search the tag */
00347                         for (i = 0; (items[i].tag && items[i].tag != entry->tag); i++);
00348                         if (!items[i].tag) {
00349                                 snprintf (val, maxlen,
00350                                           _("Internal error (unknown value %i)"), vs);
00351                                 break;
00352                         }
00353 
00354                         /* find the value */
00355                         for (j = 0; items[i].elem[j].string &&
00356                             (items[i].elem[j].index < vs); j++);
00357                         if (items[i].elem[j].index != vs) {
00358                                 snprintf (val, maxlen,
00359                                           _("Internal error (unknown value %i)"), vs);
00360                                 break;
00361                         }
00362                         strncpy (val, _(items[i].elem[j].string), maxlen);
00363                 } else {
00364                         /* Two-component values */
00365                         CF (entry->format, EXIF_FORMAT_SHORT, val, maxlen);
00366                         CC2 (entry->components, 1, 2, val, maxlen);
00367                         vs = exif_get_short (entry->data, entry->order);
00368                         vs2 = exif_get_short (entry->data+2, entry->order) << 16;
00369 
00370                         /* search the tag */
00371                         for (i = 0; (items2[i].tag && items2[i].tag != entry->tag); i++);
00372                         if (!items2[i].tag) {
00373                                 snprintf (val, maxlen,
00374                                           _("Internal error (unknown value %i %i)"), vs, vs2);
00375                                 break;
00376                         }
00377 
00378                         /* find the value */
00379                         for (j = 0; items2[i].elem[j].string && ((items2[i].elem[j].index2 < vs2)
00380                                 || ((items2[i].elem[j].index2 == vs2) && (items2[i].elem[j].index1 < vs))); j++);
00381                         if ((items2[i].elem[j].index1 != vs) || (items2[i].elem[j].index2 != vs2)) {
00382                                 snprintf (val, maxlen,
00383                                           _("Internal error (unknown value %i %i)"), vs, vs2);
00384                                 break;
00385                         }
00386                         strncpy (val, _(items2[i].elem[j].string), maxlen);
00387                 }
00388                 break;
00389 
00390         case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_ZOOM:
00391                 CF (entry->format, EXIF_FORMAT_LONG, val, maxlen);
00392                 CC (entry->components, 1, val, maxlen);
00393                 vl = exif_get_long (entry->data, entry->order);
00394                 snprintf (val, maxlen, "%li", (long int) vl);
00395                 break;
00396         case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_PRINTIM:
00397                 CF (entry->format, EXIF_FORMAT_UNDEFINED, val, maxlen);
00398                 CC (entry->components, 124, val, maxlen);
00399                 snprintf (val, maxlen, _("%i bytes unknown data"),
00400                         entry->size);
00401                 break;
00402         case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_TZ_CITY:
00403         case MNOTE_PENTAX_TAG_TZ_DST:
00404                 CF (entry->format, EXIF_FORMAT_UNDEFINED, val, maxlen);
00405                 CC (entry->components, 4, val, maxlen);
00406                 strncpy (val, (char*)entry->data, MIN(maxlen, entry->size));
00407                 break;
00408         case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_DATE:
00409                 CF (entry->format, EXIF_FORMAT_UNDEFINED, val, maxlen);
00410                 CC (entry->components, 4, val, maxlen);
00411                 /* Note: format is UNDEFINED, not SHORT -> order is fixed: MOTOROLA */
00412                 vs = exif_get_short (entry->data, EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_MOTOROLA);
00413                 snprintf (val, maxlen, "%i:%02i:%02i", vs, entry->data[2], entry->data[3]);
00414                 break;
00415         case MNOTE_PENTAX2_TAG_TIME:
00416                 CF (entry->format, EXIF_FORMAT_UNDEFINED, val, maxlen);
00417                 CC2 (entry->components, 3, 4, val, maxlen);
00418                 snprintf (val, maxlen, "%02i:%02i:%02i", entry->data[0], entry->data[1], entry->data[2]);
00419                 break;
00420         default:
00421                 switch (entry->format) {
00422                 case EXIF_FORMAT_ASCII:
00423                   strncpy (val, (char *)entry->data, MIN(maxlen, entry->size));
00424                   break;
00425                 case EXIF_FORMAT_SHORT:
00426                   {
00427                         const unsigned char *data = entry->data;
00428                         size_t k, len = strlen(val);
00429                         for(k=0; k<entry->components; k++) {
00430                                 vs = exif_get_short (data, entry->order);
00431                                 snprintf (val+len, maxlen-len, "%i ", vs);
00432                                 len = strlen(val);
00433                                 data += 2;
00434                         }
00435                   }
00436                   break;
00437                 case EXIF_FORMAT_LONG:
00438                   {
00439                         const unsigned char *data = entry->data;
00440                         size_t k, len = strlen(val);
00441                         for(k=0; k<entry->components; k++) {
00442                                 vl = exif_get_long (data, entry->order);
00443                                 snprintf (val+len, maxlen-len, "%li", (long int) vl);
00444                                 len = strlen(val);
00445                                 data += 4;
00446                         }
00447                   }
00448                   break;
00449                 case EXIF_FORMAT_UNDEFINED:
00450                 default:
00451                   snprintf (val, maxlen, _("%i bytes unknown data"),
00452                           entry->size);
00453                   break;
00454                 }
00455                 break;
00456         }
00457 
00458         return (val);
00459 }
